text: Yadi timi sanketika tarikabata ti svasniharula'i nikahako sandesa patha'umchaum athava aphna hrdayama luka'era rakhdachaum bhane timila'i kunai gunaha chaina. Allahala'i thaha cha ki timile tiniharusita (nikahako) carca garnechaum. Tara gopyarupama kunai vaca nagarnu. Ra timile ramro kura bolne gara ra jabasam'ma iddatako avadhi pura humdaina. Nikahako drdha athota nagarnu. Janirakha ki, je jati timra hrdayaharuma chan, allahala'i sabai thaha cha, tasartha usasamga dara mannegara ra yo pani janirakha ki allaha ksama pradana garnevala dayavana cha
